# THE SECOND APPENDIX, FOR FUN {#app:second-appendix}

```{r appendixB}
   options(knitr.kable.NA = '')  # get rid of NAs
   srvyset <-  paste("dbo.procRReport_Survey_SetDetails ",yr,",1,",setcnt, sep="")
   ssdat   <-  GetSQLData(srvyset,"Sablefish")
   
   latcnt  <-  length(ssdat[, 9])
               for (i in 1:latcnt){ ssdat[i,9]= paste("$",ssdat[i,9],"^o", ssdat[i,10],"$",sep="")  }
   latcnt  <-  length(ssdat[,11])
               for (i in 1:latcnt){ ssdat[i,11]=paste("$",ssdat[i,11],"^o", ssdat[i,12],"$",sep="") }
   latcnt  <-  length(ssdat[,13])
               for (i in 1:latcnt){ ssdat[i,13]=paste("$",ssdat[i,13],"^o", ssdat[i,14],"$",sep="") }
   latcnt<-length(ssdat[,15])
               for (i in 1:latcnt){ ssdat[i,15]=paste("$",ssdat[i,15],"^o", ssdat[i,16],"$",sep="") }
   
   ssdat  <-  ssdat[,c(-10)]
   ssdat  <-  ssdat[,c(-11)]
   ssdat  <-  ssdat[,c(-12)]
   ssdat  <-  ssdat[,c(-13)]
   ssdat  <-  ssdat[,c(-20)]
   
   colnames(ssdat) <- c( "Spatial Stratum", "Set", "Type", "Depth Stratum", "Date", "Time", 
                         "Duration", "Area","Latitude", "Longitude", "Latitude", "Longitude", 
                         "Start","End","Mean","Traps Fished", "SBE39", "Hobo", "CTD")
   kable(ssdat) %>%
     add_header_above(c(" "= 8,"Start"=2, "End"=2, "Bottom Depth (m)"=3, " "= 4)) %>%
     kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped",  full_width = T, font_size = 9) %>%
     scroll_box(width = "98%", height = "600px")
   
    

```
